mapper.select: select u.*,d.`name` as dept_name from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.id where u.is_deleted = 1
select u.* from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id where ur.role_id=#{roleId} and u.is_deleted=1 and ur.is_deleted=1

SELECT u.* FROM sys_user u
AND (u.real_name like #{_search} or u.user_name like #{_search} or u.mobile_phone like #{_search})
AND u.id NOT IN (SELECT ur.user_id FROM sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.is_deleted = 1 AND u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.role_id = #{roleId} and ur.is_deleted=1) AND u.is_deleted=1
select ra.access from sys_role_access ra left join sys_user_role ur on ra.role_id=ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and ra.is_deleted=1 and ur.is_deleted=1

select m.* from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_role r on rm.role_id = r.id left join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id=#{userId} and m.is_deleted=1 and r.is_deleted=1 and rm.is_deleted=1 and ur.is_deleted=1

SELECT r.data_scope FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND ur.is_deleted=1 AND u.is_deleted=1 AND r.is_deleted=1 GROUP BY r.data_scope

SELECT r.role_key FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND ur.is_deleted=1 AND u.is_deleted=1 AND r.is_deleted=1 GROUP BY r.role_key
select distinct u.id from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.id=ur.user_id left join sys_role r on ur.role_id=r.id where r.role_key=#{roleKey}
